recommendations: Abdulaziz AlMalki “I have known Saeed in a variety of capacities for many years since we worked together at Futureware. Saeed is a reference in the field of online UX and digital marketing.I highly recommend Saeed for any position or endeavor that he may seek to pursue. He will be a valuable asset for any organization.”

Ali Alsuwaii, M.Sc., PMP “Saeed is creative UI developer. During the period that we have worked together, Saeed mastered number of technologies that made him a great help to the team and successful project delivery was not possible without his participation. Saeed has contributed significantly when we were exercising "collective development" where everybody contribute his knowledge and we end up achieving what we cannot make individually each on his own.”
